title: Kaspersky Security Network KSN
extract: The Kaspersky Security Network (KSN) is a complex distributed infrastructure dedicated to intelligently processing cybersecurity-related data streams from millions of voluntary participants around the world. ... The growing number and complexity of threats requires a specific approach to cybersecurity.
